message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product I have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value to me and I believe it could be equally beneficial to you. Given its worth to me, I am prepared to extend this exclusive offer at a price of $15,000. This is a special deal considering the product's true value and my desire to see it go to someone who appreciates it as much as I do. I trust you will find it worthy of your investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
